      • raiseEvent

        public void raiseEvent(java.lang.String eventName,
                       java.lang.Object... args)
                throws InTrasistionException,
                       InvalidEventException,
                       UnknownEventException,
                       NoTransitionException,
                       CancelledException,
                       AsyncException,
                       NotInTransitionException
        Initiates a state transition with the named event. The call takes a variable number of arguments that will be passed to the callback, if defined. It if the state change is ok or one of these errors: - event X inappropriate because previous transition did not complete - event X inappropriate in current state Y - event X does not exist - internal error on state transition
        Throws:
        InTrasistionException
        InvalidEventException
        UnknownEventException
        NoTransitionException
        AsyncException
        CancelledException
        NotInTransitionException

      • transition
